content: sweet moon mitts here s a pair of sweet mitts to wear while staying up late writing reading a book or just gazing out the window at the moon with your chin in your hands needles ​ us 2/2 75 mm dpns or size to obtain gauge yarns used knit picks palette fingering 100% wool 231 yards/211 meters mc na​vy 24001 1 skein cc mist ​ 23733 ​ ​1 skein gauge 36 sts and 38 row per 4 /10cm in pattern notions yarn needle and extra yarn or stitch holder for holding thumb stitches marker for thumb stitches stitches twisted rib knit one through back loop purl one repeat to end of round both gloves cuff cast on 56 stitches in mc and join in round being careful not to twist work in twisted rib until piece measures 1 inch left glove ​on first 28 stitches work the first row of chart 1 left hand on second 28 work the first row of chart 3 palm work in pattern until row 25 of chart left glove thumb gusset w​ ork left hand chart 1 as written and palm chart 3 for 22 stitches 6 stitches remain in row place marker begin thumb gusset as shown in chart 4 with a yarnover place marker continue as established working thumb gusset in between markers when thumb gusset is complete row 19 of thumb chart row 44 of palm chart put the stitches on a piece of yarn or a stitch holder on the next row continue in both charts as established be sure it pull stitches snugly over the thumb right glove ​on first 28 stitches work the first row of chart 2 on second 28 work the first row of chart 3 work in pattern until row 25 of chart right glove thumb gusset ​work left hand chart 1 as written and palm chart 3 for 6 stitches 22 stitches remain in row place marker begin thumb gusset as shown in chart 4 with a yarnover place marker continue as established working thumb gusset in between markers when thumb gusset is complete row 19 of thumb chart 44 of palm chart put the stitches on a piece of yarn or a stitch holder on the next row continue in both charts as established be sure it pull stitches snugly over the thumb both gloves knit to the end of both charts top ribbing work ½ inch of twisted rib and bind off in pattern thumb finishing take the 17 stitches off the stitch holder on the thumb gusset pick up 3 additional stitches at the top of the gusset 20 stitches work in twisted rib in round for ¼ inch and bind off in pattern finishing weave in all ends block charts 1 - left glove 2 - right glove 3 palm for left and right gloves 4 thumb gusset i hope you enjoyed this patterarn it hasn t been tech edited so feel free to reach out to me on
